name: Gas POS, Inc.
description: Developer of an EMV-compliant point-of-sale system designed to assist with the transition to EMV upgrades at the pump. The company's system provides payment security and point-to-point encryption to protect from fraud, hacking and fines, enabling gas station owners to avail fuel control and fleet card acceptance by upgrading to EMV-chip reading pumps and running fuel business conveniently with reduced frauds and costs.
one_liner: Developer of an EMV-compliant point-of-sale system designed to assist with the transition to EMV upgrades at the pump. The company's system provides payment security and point-to-point encryption to protect from fraud, hacking and fines, enabling gas station owners to avail fuel control and fleet card acceptance by upgrading to EMV-chip reading pumps and running fuel business conveniently with reduced frauds and costs.
